queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Firewall AS row
THAT allows AS rel
Internet AS col
RETURN
row.displayName AS x,
col.displayName AS y,
rel.egress AS egress,
rel.ingress AS ingress,
rel.fromPort as fromPort,
rel.toPort as toPort,
rel.ipProtocol AS label

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Firewall AS row
THAT allows AS rel
Network with public=true or _source='system-mapper' AS col
RETURN
row.displayName AS x,
col.displayName AS y,
rel.egress AS egress,
rel.ingress AS ingress,
rel.fromPort as fromPort,
rel.toPort as toPort,
rel.ipProtocol AS label

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Firewall AS row
THAT allows AS rel
Network with public!=true AS col
RETURN
row.displayName AS x,
col.displayName AS y,
rel.egress AS egress,
rel.ingress AS ingress,
rel.fromPort as fromPort,
rel.toPort as toPort,
rel.ipProtocol AS label

queries.name: query1
queries.query: find Certificate with active=false as c return count(c) as value

widgets.title: DNS Records Not Pointing to an Internal Resource

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_route53_record with (resourceRecords!=undefined or aliasTarget!=undefined) 
and type=('A' or 'AAAA' or 'CNAME') as a
that !connects *
return count(a) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query: find DomainRecord as a return count(a) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find Certificate with active=false as c 
return
c._type, c.displayName, c.accountId, c.active, 
c.alternativeNames, c.expiresOn, c.inUse, c.region

widgets.title: DNS records not pointing to an internal resource

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find DomainRecord with (resourceRecords!=undefined or aliasTarget!=undefined) 
and type=('A' or 'AAAA' or 'CNAME') as a
that !connects *
return 
a.displayName, a.accountId, a.resourceRecords

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find DomainRecord as a
return
a._type, a.displayName, a.accountId, a.resourceRecords, a.type
